title: Myth Busters: 19 Wrong Beliefs About The Novel Coronavirus – Channels Television
content: Exposing yourself to the sun or to temperatures higher than 25C degrees DOES NOT prevent the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19) You can catch COVID-19, no matter how sunny or hot the weather is. Countries with hot weather have reported cases of COVID-19.
warning: Based on the content, title and language on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
